featuresSection.heading: Finding Your Dream Home Size Options When You Buy House in Sector 105 Gurugram
description: Sector 105 offers a diverse inventory of residential properties, ranging from compact, modern builder floors to sprawling luxury villas. The property sizes here are designed to meet the growing demand for spacious living near the burgeoning commercial centers of Gurugram.

Whether you are a nuclear family looking for a manageable 4 Marla plot size converted into a comfortable 3 BHK floor, or a larger joint family needing a grand 14 Marla independent house, Sector 105 has suitable options. We focus on properties constructed with high-quality materials, adherence to Vastu principles, and strategic location advantages. Understanding the layout and potential of each plot size helps prospective buyers visualize their dream lifestyle. Let us guide you through the available configurations to buy house in Sector 105 that perfectly matches your requirements and budget constraints for an assured future investment.

features.title: 4 Marla Plot for Efficient Living
features.description: Typically utilized for modern 2 BHK or compact 3 BHK builder floors, these properties offer efficient use of space ideal for young professionals or small families. They provide affordability and maintenance ease while still enjoying the excellent amenities and robust security of Sector 105 Gurugram. These homes are designed for maximum utility and urban accessibility.

features.title: 6 Marla Plot for Spacious Builder Floors
features.description: Perfect for spacious 3 BHK builder floors or smaller independent duplex houses. These homes strike a balance between space and investment cost, often featuring private parking, lift access, and premium internal finishes necessary for comfortable urban living. This size is highly popular among mid-sized families seeking value.

features.title: 8 Marla Plot for Mid-Sized Luxury Homes
features.description: A preferred size for luxurious 4 BHK builder floors or mid-sized independent houses. Properties built on 8 Marla plots in Sector 105 often include dedicated servant quarters, multiple balconies, and expansive living and dining areas, reflecting true upscale living tailored for comfort and status.

features.description: Represents the entry point for custom-built luxury villas and larger independent houses. Buyers seeking this size enjoy ample front and back yards, dedicated entertainment spaces, and the freedom to design unique interiors tailored to personal tastes, offering significant exclusivity and personalization.

These magnificent homes often boast high ceilings, private terraces, home offices, and generous landscaping space, providing an exclusive and private lifestyle highly sought after in Sector 105.

features.description: The pinnacle of residential luxury in Sector 105, accommodating expansive mansions and ultra-luxury custom homes. These plots allow for the integration of private pools, elaborate security systems, and extensive green spaces, defining elite residential property ownership and ensuring maximum space and privacy.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Buying Residential Property in Sector 105 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Get quick answers to the most common queries regarding property purchasing, legal formalities, and investment outlook for houses in Sector 105.

faqs.question: What types of residential properties are available to buy house in Sector 105
faqs.answer: Sector 105 offers a wide spectrum of housing options catering to various preferences. The primary inventory includes luxurious independent houses or villas built on varying plot sizes, modern builder floors typically ranging from 3 BHK to 4 BHK units, and residential plots for custom construction. Builder floors offer affordability and manageable space, while independent houses provide maximum privacy and land ownership. The area focuses on high-quality construction and Vastu compliance across all formats.

faqs.question: Is Sector 105 considered a good investment location right now
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 105 is recognized as one of the most promising investment destinations along the Dwarka Expressway corridor. Its value is driven by excellent current and future connectivity, especially its proximity to the Expressway and planned metro link. The demand for housing here is consistently high among end-users and investors seeking substantial capital appreciation, making it a strategically sound time to buy house in Sector 105 before prices fully mature.

faqs.question: What is the typical price range for houses for sale in Sector 105
faqs.answer: The price range for houses in Sector 105 varies significantly based on property type, size, construction quality, and exact location within the sector. Builder floors generally start at a more accessible price point, while large independent villas on 10 Marla plots or more command premium pricing. It is best to consult our latest market reports or speak with an agent to get a precise valuation reflecting current market dynamics for your specific requirement.

faqs.question: How is the connectivity from Sector 105 to major hubs like Cyber City
faqs.answer: Connectivity is a major highlight of Sector 105. Thanks to the Dwarka Expressway, the commute to major commercial centers like Cyber City is relatively smooth and fast compared to older parts of Gurugram. Additionally, access to NH-48 and the proximity to the proposed Global City site further ensures that Sector 105 is strategically linked to all major employment and social hubs in the National Capital Region.

faqs.question: Are the available properties in Sector 105 legally approved and verified
faqs.answer: Our dedicated legal team conducts stringent due diligence on every property listed in Sector 105. We ensure that all houses and plots have clear titles, are free from encumbrances, and possess all necessary approvals from the relevant regulatory authorities, including HUDA and DTCP. We prioritize providing transparent documentation to secure your investment fully.

faqs.question: What social infrastructure is available near Sector 105 Gurugram
faqs.answer: The social infrastructure around Sector 105 is robust and rapidly expanding. Residents have access to reputable schools such as DPS, specialized multi-specialty hospitals, and numerous high-street retail developments and shopping complexes located in the adjoining sectors, ensuring a high quality of life with immediate access to essential services.

faqs.question: Can I get home loan assistance when I buy house in Sector 105
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We partner with leading financial institutions and banks to offer comprehensive home loan facilitation services. Our consultants assist you throughout the entire loan application process, providing tailored advice on eligibility criteria, documentation required, and securing the most competitive interest rates available for properties in Sector 105.

faqs.question: Are there any security concerns in Sector 105 residential areas
faqs.answer: Sector 105 is generally considered highly secure, especially within the gated residential communities that dominate the area. These communities implement 24/7 security monitoring, controlled entry points, and regular patrolling. When you buy house in Sector 105, you are choosing a locality where safety and peace of mind are prioritized by both residents and developers.

faqs.question: What is the status of water and electricity supply in the sector
faqs.answer: The Sector 105 area benefits from established infrastructure planning. While individual houses or builder floors often rely on internal power backup systems for uninterrupted supply, the overall civic amenities, including water and electricity connections, are reliable and managed by the designated civic bodies, ensuring consistent utility service for all residents.

faqs.question: Should I consider a builder floor or an independent house in Sector 105
faqs.answer: The choice depends on your budget and need for privacy. Builder floors offer a lower capital outlay, ease of maintenance, and contemporary design, suitable for nuclear families. Independent houses provide complete ownership of the land, greater space, and the freedom to construct or renovate as desired, ideal for large families prioritizing privacy and high appreciation potential.
